title: [Grasslands, Ravine Bank]
description: The plateau ends abruptly here at the bank of a deep ravine, the ground falling away in a sheer drop to the black grotto far below.  A lone acacia stands on a strip of rocky dirt at the edge of the grass, its branches extending in a canopy over the treacherous cliff.
